cont.entity_a: Lacks instructions, making it difficult to realize the need to record the time the package was opened. Easy to use with straightforward instructions.
The package only contains one pack, though instructions specify two.
cont.entity_b: No protective case included, which would be beneficial.

cont.entity_a: Test results were consistent with professional services. Results aligned with previous tests, suggesting accuracy. Some reports indicate inaccurate results according to Consumer Reports. Mixed reviews on accuracy and reliability.
cont.entity_b: Sensitive to gas leaks. Effective for locating gas leaks undetected by other methods. Highly sensitive, detecting leaks missed by other methods. Some reports of false positives due to environmental factors.

cont.entity_a: Customer service issues, such as being on hold and disconnected. Issues with kit contents and customer service highlighted.
Results were not received for some kits, leading to frustration.

cont.entity_b: Good for residential use but lacks numeric readout. Useful for detecting leaks in hard-to-reach places.
Some units arrived in poor condition, suggesting quality control issues. Mixed durability with some units failing quickly.
Durable and reliable with adjustable sensitivity. Battery issues noted in some units.
Requires careful calibration to avoid false positives.
Sensitive sensor, but fragile protective cap.
